attributes.action: Higher regulation for casino and bingo advertising
attributes.additional_details:
Advertising for casinos and bingo has got out of control,i believe that all advertising for onling gambling institutions should be banned and with stricter regulation for the advertising of those providing off-line services.
Advertising of this nature is out of hand and is far worse  than tobacco advertising ever was , with tobacco the users friends and family can see him/her using it ,can see him/her buting it and encourage him/her to quit using.
Onling gambling is easily done in secret form those around them, usually ending in financial turmoil before the family knows what is happening.
Gambling is a serious addiction,act on your own conscience
